features: GENTLE CLEAN – Forever New detergent has a base of gentle ingredients, creating a highly effective formula that deep cleans and extends the life of your garments. Key Product Features
NO RESIDUE AFTERWARDS – The concentrated blend removes stains and soils while rinsing completely free from fabric, leaving no soap residue or damage to the thread fibers.

ANIMAL & ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY – Forever New products have no bleach, brighteners, dyes, phosphates, lanolin, or petroleum ingredients. All products are also certified as not being tested on any animals.
GENTLE FOR YOUR SKIN – Forever New prevents irritation or skin reaction and is gentle to use. Ideal detergent for a wash machine or hand washing.
KEEP COLORS THEIR COLOR – Perfect for colorfast clothing, but always test for colorfastness ahead of time just to be sure. Specifically designed for cold water, Ovacion protects dark colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT light fragrance and gets all my clothes clean!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this stuff! I use it on ALL my laundry ALL the time! I can't believe how many reviewers only use it on their delicates!? It does a great job washing my regular clothing, delicates, darks, lights, everything! Y'all should use it on everything like I do! Really really nice detergent. I've been using Tide for a long time, and I've been using the powder. This is so much easier to use. I dissolve 2 measuring tablespoons in 2 cups of water, pour it in my washer, dump the clothes in, and hit Start! Great laundry detergent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I hand wash my compression stockings each week and bought this product to use. It had a very delicate scent and pulls out the soil with low sudsing. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect to wash chlorine from swimsuit
reviews.reviewText: Using daily … just a squirt — no residue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light, pleasant scent
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to leave a review on this one because it was that good. I'm tempted to get the unscented on my repurchase (because of my cat who stares in me in judgement for any scent), but I like the scent so much I am going scented again. Scent is delicate, light, fragrant, pleasant. I mostly go natural on scents, if any at all; this definitely doesn't smell like essential oil but it's delicate enough it works. I initially got this for lingerie only. Stuff didn't last nearly long enough, because I realized I liked using it on all my linens (bedding, sheets, linen napkins, cottons), and as well as undergarments. So here I am again, getting a new bottle for "lingerie".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's great for dark clothes
reviews.reviewText: I have used forever new for a very long time. I'm not sure if you really need one separately for blacks, but since most of my laundry is black I decided to give it a try. Keeps my clothes soft, doesn't fade, and leaves a fresh scent that's not overwhelming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product with multiple uses
reviews.reviewText: I adore this product! Since I only do laundry for one and have a lot of professional washable items, along with relatively sensitive skin, I use this product almost exclusively for all of my clothing laundry. I've even successfully washed Costco 100% cashmere sweaters in a lingerie bag with this stuff with wonderful results (though I don't recommend it, I just hate dry cleaning and chemicals and hand washing makes it difficult to rinse when you don't have a huge garage sink, only a small apartment with bathroom and kitchen sinks).I use this product to hand wash the outside of my washable pillow, too. I take a clean rag made from a hand towel, get it wet and put a bit of the Ovacion on it, then pad down the outside of my pillow and get it relatively wet. I then rinse the rag and get it fairly wet then go over the outside of the pillow to sort of rinse it. I throw the pillow in the dryer with a few tennis balls and it comes out extremely fresh, whereas washing my super thick pillow in the washer and drying it takes a full day.I also use this hand wash method, without always using the dryer, on the top part of my comforter that touches my face. My washer isn't big enough to put the comforter in without ripping it to shreds, so I wash the upper foot of it by hand and let it air dry (I do throw it in the dryer once in a while with the wet side facing the incoming hot air to freshen the whole thing ever month or so). This product is delicate enough to avoid irritating my skin even when not fully rinsed, but it breaks down dirt and oils well enough to freshen these items up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always been miffed why we don’t wash our bras more often. I hate hand washing and my bras never feel or look as clean. My bras came out looking brand new out of the delicate cycle! Wow
